ix.iquery
Class IQuery.LookupThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      ix.util.CatchingThread
          ix.iquery.IQuery.LookupThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
IQuery
protected class IQuery.LookupThread
extends CatchingThread

A thread that invokes a LookupHandler.

When started, this thread makes a new LookupHandler by calling IQuery.makeLookupHandler(IQuery, Activity) and then calls the handler's LookupHandler.handleLookup() method.

Method Detail

innerRun

public void innerRun()
Description copied from class: CatchingThread
Calls the run() method of the innerRunnable passed to the constructor, if innerRunnable is non-null; otherwise does nothing. An alternative to supplying an innerRunnable is to redefine this method in a subclass.

Overrides:
innerRun in class CatchingThread
